responsibilities: Built an online mentorship platform for professional skills learning, which achieved annual revenue of $500,000 and attracted over 60,000 followers

Led a team of 8 persons including AI researchers, designers, and software engineers, building a short video creation tool to help knowledge workers promote their services and courses

Led cross-departmental project as the product owner to build local Smart Home framework equivalent to Home Automation server, providing a local home experience with 3X faster queries execution
Managed the offline NLU model's iteration to reach quality on par with server and support feature expansion
Served as the lead product manager and designed software products supporting autonomous driving system's workflows and fleet of trucks' operation
Optimized the data pipeline from data collection to post-processing, reducing the data idle time by over 30%
Owned HD mapping team's development and productization, doubling the speed of map generation through semi-automation
Invented a technique using infrared camera and computer vision to capture finger touching points when human naturally grasping packages; filed a US patent application
Developed software application automating images capturing and 3D point clouds storage process
Tutored operating team on system use, wrote code specifics, and created user manual
Built a cross-functional team of six to create an information exchange platform from ideation to MVP, enabling college students in Beijing to find help with everyday tasks
Defined user growth plan, achieving over 30,000 users with 6,000+ DAU within the first year
Achieved monthly revenue of $12,000 by offering VIP features and partnering with local businesses
Conducted user experience survey and competitor analysis on live video products; provided contexts for A/B testing
Designed reputation system and reporting feature to enhance user's gaming experience on Tencent Game Platform
Launched 4th anniversary program of League of Legends on WeChat, visualizing players' gaming records, attracting over 3 million views
